solution_line_template: The second and third tank each have {fish_in_first_tank}*{multiplier_for_other_tanks}=<<{fish_in_first_tank}*{multiplier_for_other_tanks}={fish_in_other_tanks}>>{fish_in_other_tanks} fish
So in total there are {fish_in_first_tank}+{fish_in_other_tanks}*{num_other_tanks}=<<{fish_in_first_tank}+{fish_in_other_tanks}*{num_other_tanks}={total_fish}>>{total_fish} fish
